title: Nigel Farage
summary: Nigel Paul Farage (/ˈfærɑːʒ/;[lower-alpha 3] born 3 April 1964)[4] is a British broadcaster and former politician who was Leader of the UK Independence Party (UKIP) from 2006 to 2009 and 2010 to 2016 and Leader of the Brexit Party from 2019 to 2021. He was Member of the European Parliament (MEP) for South East England from 1999 until the United Kingdom's exit from the EU in 2020. He was the host of The Nigel Farage Show, a radio phone-in on the Global-owned talk radio station LBC, from 2017 to 2020.[5] Farage is currently the Honorary President of Reform UK[6] and a presenter on GB News.
